entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -2.7°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 7:49 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:49 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming north 20 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 7:49 PM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
